lavcLetter.invitation_lavc_2025: You can't miss LAVC 2025, contests, conferences, shows and much more.

location_letter.location_description: JOCKEY EXHIBITION CENTER, Av. Javier Prado Este at the intersection with Panamericana Sur Road S/N, near Gate 1, Monterrico Racecourse, Parcel I, Santiago de Surco

horizontal_card.motto: The largest continuing education conference in veterinary medicine on the Pacific coast of South America

nav_main.social_widget_message: Hi! How can I help you?

hero.tagline: The most important veterinary medicine event!
hero.description: You're just one step away from registering. Don't miss this unique opportunity!

benefits.title: These are some of the benefits we offer you
benefits.subtitle: Why attend LAVC?

exclusive_talks.title: üéì Exclusive talks with international speakers
exclusive_talks.description: Up-to-date topics, real clinical cases, and trends that will shape the future of the profession.

networking.title: ü§ù Networking with thousands of colleagues and experts
networking.description: Exchange experiences, expand your network, and strengthen the veterinary community.

commercial_zone.title: üß™ Commercial zone with more than 60 companies
commercial_zone.description: Explore the latest in products, services, and innovation for veterinary medicine‚Äîfrom equipment to pharmacology, technology, and more.

specialized_event.title: üåé 100% specialized event
specialized_event.description: Unlike other conferences, LAVC is designed exclusively for veterinarians. Every talk, booth, and activity has one goal: improving your professional practice.

experience.title: This was LAVC 2025
experience.subtitle: Unforgettable experience
experience.description: LAVC 2025 was a historic edition. More than 5,500 attendees enjoyed four intense days of learning, connection, and discovery. Over 20 conferences with international speakers showcased new treatments, products, and technologies, strengthening ties among professionals across Latin America. Don't miss the next edition‚ÄîLAVC 2026 promises to be even bigger, richer, and more impactful.

location.title: Find us at
location.subtitle: Where will it take place?
location.description: The event will take place at the Jockey Club Exhibition Center, located near the Panamericana highway, in the area of Avenida 3 de Mayo.

tourism.title: Tourism
tourism.subtitle: The best of Peru for your LAVC 2026 experience
tourism.description1: During your participation in LAVC 2026, you'll have the opportunity to discover some of the most fascinating destinations in Peru. Explore Lima, a vibrant capital by the sea with a rich colonial heritage and world-renowned gastronomy. Immerse yourself in Inca history in Cusco, the Sacred Valley, and the majestic citadel of Machu Picchu. And for nature lovers, Puerto Maldonado awaits with its tropical jungles and the unique biodiversity of the Tambopata National Reserve.
tourism.description2: Get ready for an unforgettable experience before or after the conference!
